In the US, after officially accepting the Republican presidential nomination,...
...Mitt Romney calls on Americans to put the disappointments of the last four years behind them.
In Syria, French Foreign Minister Laurent Fabius and British Foreign Secretary William Hague urge Assad supporters to back away from the regime.
In the UK, the Paralympic Games are under way in London.
In the Cook Islands, US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton arrives for the Pacific Islands Forum.
In China, a landmark building is demolished in the city of Chongqing to make way for a skyscraper.
In France, A French-based firm offers the ultimate in luxury office equipment - a gold-plated computer inspired by King Louis XVI.
